name: Short Syntax Highlighter Shortcode
author: digcms.com

sections.description:
Short Syntax Highlighter allows you to easily post syntax-highlighted code to your site without losing it’s formatting or making any manual changes.
Without adding any JS or css file in your theme.

This plugin will help you to highlight the code systax.

Step by step installation instructions >>

Demo URL:
http://wpapi.com

Click here for customer support >>

Sample of using the plugin Can be found on following URL:

Sample of using the plugin instructions >>

Tested upto 4.0

Functionality

This plugin will help you to highlight the code systax.

Help

Click here for customer support >>

For help and support please contact us at contact [at] digcms.com
sections.installation:
Step by step insllation instructions >>

Follow the steps below to install the plugin.
1. Upload the short-syntax-highlighter directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in wp
3. You are ready for use the plugin
sections.faq:
1. How can I use the this plugin for syntax highlighing
    Ans: Just put [php]code here[/php] or [css]code here[/css]. Now we supporting only php and css language

  2. Can I change the code color
    Ans: Yes, you can change the color. using following format . just specify the color value
    [php wpapi=”php” id=”123″ color=”red”]

Click here for customer support >>
